titleStmt.title: William P. Gardner et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG6638

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: To his excellincy the Governor of the Commonwealth of Ky

The undersigned respectfully represent that on the 6" day of april 1865 an execution Issued from the Clark Circuit Court in favor of the Comonwealth of Ky and against G. W. Webster principal & William P Gardner his Surety for the Sum of 57.57/100 and interest from 19" day of July 1858 till paid and $1.60/100 cost which Execution is now in the Hands of the Sheriff of Henry County to be levied upon the effects of the Said Gardner who is now a resident of Henry County the facts connected with the said Execution are as follows some years ago the said Webster was arrested & Held to bail in Clark County and to releave him from imprisonment the said Gardner went on his bail bond as his Surity the bond was afterwards forfited. Judgment taken thereon and the execution above named execution Issued as aforesaid the Petitioners ^state^ that the said Webster was afterwards appr^e^hended tried and convicted and is now in the Penitentiary of the State of Ky Gardner is a poor man upon whome to a great extent has devolved the maintenance of the family of Webster since he has been in the Penitentiary We therefore ask your excellency to remit said Judgment and
releave the said Gardner from the operation of said Execution --

William P Gardner
Geo T Hamston Clerk
Henry Circuit Court
W. J. Brewer Sheriff of Henry Co
M. B. Pearce Clerk
Henry County Court

Clark Cir Ct
vs
Wm P Gardner
$57.55
Forfeiture
Remit
3d June 1865
sent for fee
30th May/ 65
